alert.note: Alert for Marion; Morgan (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 18 at 11:20AM EDT until July 19 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... White River at Ravenswood. .Rainfall amounts of 4 to 9 inches fell over portions of NE Central Indiana Sunday. This could lead to minor flooding at Ravenswood on the White River. Other creeks and lowlands in the area have also risen and caused flooding issues, but they should start to recede through the day. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Ravenswood. * WHEN...From late tonight to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 6.0 feet, Lowest portion of Ravenswood begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 6.0 feet just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
